grades.grade_description: Koosh Natural sets a new standard with its unique cell structure and natural soy content. This 2.6 lb. High Resiliency Foam offers a softer surface, superior comfort and support, and outstanding fatigue resistance compared to conventional polyurethane foam. Combining high-level performance with a more eco-friendly composition, Koosh Natural is the ideal choice for those seeking durability, comfort, and sustainability in one premium product.

Preserve High Resiliency (HR) is premium commercial grade foam line that has a 2.6 lbs density and is certiPUR-US certified. It is not made with any harmful chemicals or substances. HR foam is heavier and does not soften with use like conventional polyurethane grades. It is also made with larger and more open cells, this allows for better air flow and cooler sleep surfaces. It is available in 7 different compressions for high-end furniture and sleeping applications. For people that prefer the very best performance. Preserve is a peachy gold colour.

NeoCell is a high-density foam (2.1 lbs) that outperforms conventional grades in both height loss and firmness retention. It is the top choice for upholsterers working on high-end foam refurbishment projects, offering exceptional comfort, durability, and support. This light blue foam combines premium quality with a great price point, making it an excellent value for a wide range of seating and mattress applications.

Most furniture manufacturers use foam in the 1.5 lb to 1.8 lb density range for seating. Ecocell, at 1.9 lbs per cubic foot, exceeds conventional standards, offering enhanced durability and support. This white foam provides excellent value for money, delivering superior performance at a competitive price. Ideal for quality furniture and bedding applications, Ecocell is the perfect choice for those who seek a balance of performance, longevity, and affordability.

This line is mostly used by furniture manufacturers that supply furniture to good stores. 1.8 lbs density and good value for a conventional foam. Used for seating and bedding applications for full foam mattresses. Stores and online mattress in a box marketers call it the "best". For better value, consider EcoCell or NeoCell for superior durability and comfort.

Qik-Dri Outdoor Foam is ideal for outdoor cushions exposed to the elements. Its reticulated foam structure allows water to drain quickly, preventing moisture buildup and promoting faster drying. However, if you are using outdoor fabric, you could also consider Koosh or Preserve, which are mould and mildew resistant.

Use 1.5 lb. for basic seating in office furniture, dinette seats or furniture that is sold at flea markets or discount stores. Has a low cost but also has a lower performance level. Can be used for Sofa Bed mattresses or better Camp mattresses for longevity and heavier use. For better quality backs use 1517.

Packing foam, cheaper pillows, outside backs & arms, used for toppers in conventional spring mattress. Thicker furniture backs greater than 4" thick or softer pillows. The firmness should be higher when thickness is lower. For 2" & 3" backs use 1118 or even better 1517. Good furniture backs & arms. Basic occasional bedding i.e. Camp mattresses. For firmer or thinner commercial backs, used for backs with buttons for stuffing.

Used in packaging applications and curling bumpers. Super Firm - Dense, firm and durable. Rebond is used in commercial seating or for applications such as gym mats, sound proofing, and vibration dampening. For 2" gym mats & really firm applications where thickness is limited. Better quality gym mats, exercise equipment, firm edges for extra firm mattresses. Remember the denisty determines durability and not the firmness.
